SEARCH
Package edu.uw.pce.advjava.support.account

Class AccountManager

java.lang.Object
edu.uw.pce.advjava.support.account.AccountManager
public class AccountManager extends Object
Interface for managing accounts. Provides interfaces for the basic account operations; create, delete, authentication and persistence.
Author:
Russ Moul

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AccountManager(AccountDao dao)
    Creates a new Simple account manager using the specified AccountDao for persistence.

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountManager

      public AccountManager(AccountDao dao)
      Creates a new Simple account manager using the specified AccountDao for persistence.
      Parameters:
      dao - the DAO to use for persistence

  • Method Details

    • persist

      public void persist(Account account) throws AccountException
      Used to persist an account.
      Parameters:
      account - the account to persist
      Throws:
      AccountException - if operation fails

    • getAccount

      public Account getAccount(String accountName) throws AccountException
      Lookup an account based on accountName.
      Parameters:
      accountName - the name of the desired account
      Returns:
      the account if located otherwise null
      Throws:
      AccountException - if operation fails

    • deleteAccount

      public void deleteAccount(String accountName) throws AccountException
      Remove the account.
      Parameters:
      accountName - the name of the account to remove
      Throws:
      AccountException - if operation fails

    • createAccount

      public Account createAccount(String accountName, String password, int balance, String holderName) throws AccountException
      Creates an account.
      Parameters:
      accountName - the name for account to add
      password - the password used to gain access to the account
      balance - the initial balance of the account
      holderName - the name of the account holder
      Returns:
      the newly created account
      Throws:
      AccountException - if the account already exists, or account creation fails for any reason

    • validateLogin

      public boolean validateLogin(String accountName, String password) throws AccountException
      Check whether a login is valid. AccountName must exist and password must match.
      Parameters:
      accountName - name of account the password is to be validated for
      password - password is to be validated
      Returns:
      true if password is valid for account identified by username
      Throws:
      AccountException - if error occurs accessing accounts

    • close

      public void close() throws AccountException
      Closes the account manager.
      Throws:
      AccountException - if the DAO can't be closed
